00059 #ifndef HEADER_RIPEMD_H
00060 #define HEADER_RIPEMD_H
00061 
00062 #include <openssl/e_os2.h>
00063 
00064 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00065 extern "C" {
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_RIPEMD
00069 #error RIPEMD is disabled.
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #if defined(OPENSSL_SYS_WIN16) || defined(__LP32__)
00073 #define RIPEMD160_LONG unsigned long
00074 #elif defined(OPENSSL_SYS_CRAY) || defined(__ILP64__)
00075 #define RIPEMD160_LONG unsigned long
00076 #define RIPEMD160_LONG_LOG2 3
00077 #else
00078 #define RIPEMD160_LONG unsigned int
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 #define RIPEMD160_CBLOCK    64
00082 #define RIPEMD160_LBLOCK    (RIPEMD160_CBLOCK/4)
00083 #define RIPEMD160_DIGEST_LENGTH 20
00084 
00085 typedef struct RIPEMD160state_st
00086     {
00087     RIPEMD160_LONG A,B,C,D,E;
00088     RIPEMD160_LONG Nl,Nh;
00089     RIPEMD160_LONG data[RIPEMD160_LBLOCK];
00090     int num;
00091     } RIPEMD160_CTX;
00092 
00093 int RIPEMD160_Init(RIPEMD160_CTX *c);
00094 int RIPEMD160_Update(RIPEMD160_CTX *c, const void *data, unsigned long len);
00095 int RIPEMD160_Final(unsigned char *md, RIPEMD160_CTX *c);
00096 unsigned char *RIPEMD160(const unsigned char *d, unsigned long n,
00097     unsigned char *md);
00098 void RIPEMD160_Transform(RIPEMD160_CTX *c, const unsigned char *b);
00099 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00100 }
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #endif
